info.description: API to retrieve the cash flow details of the interest rate swap contracts and calculates the present value of both asset leg and liability leg cash flows. In case of cross currency swap contracts this API calculates the currency wise daily profit/loss incurred from the NPV revaluation based on the discount rate provided.
info.title: Treasury interest rate swap revaluation

get.summary: Retrieves the currency wise daily profit/loss details for net present value method of revaluation.
get.description: Retrieves the currency wise daily profit/loss details of swap contract resulting from NPV revaluation based on the discount rate provided.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

parameters.name: discountRate
parameters.description: The rate used to discount a future cash flow.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction
